Papers

  • Meta-Analytics: Tools for Understanding the Statistical Properties of Sports Metrics [arXiv]

    Alex Franks, Alex D'Amour, Dan Cervone, and Luke Bornn
    Journal of Quantitative Analysis in Sports (2017)

  • Studying Basketball through the Lens of Player Tracking Data [book chapter]

    Luke Bornn, Dan Cervone, Alex Franks, and Andrew Miller
    Appears in Handbook of Statistical Methods and Analyses in Sports (2016); Jim Albert, Mark Glickman, Tim Swartz, Ruud Koning, editors

  • StatCast Dashboard: Exploration of Spatiotemporal Baseball Data [pubmed]

    Marcos Lage, Jorge Ono, Dan Cervone, Justin Chiang, Carlos Dietrich, and Claudio Silva
    IEEE Computer Graphics and Applications (2016)

  • Gaussian Process Regression with Location Errors [arXiv]

    Dan Cervone and Natesh Pillai
    In Preparation

  • A Multiresolution Stochastic Process Model for Predicting Basketball Possession Outcomes [arXiv]

    Dan Cervone, Alex D'Amour, Luke Bornn, and Kirk Goldsberry
    Journal of the American Statistical Assocation (2016)

  • A Location-Mixture Autoregressive Model for Online Forecasting of Lung Tumor Motion [arXiv]

    Dan Cervone, Natesh Pillai, Debdeep Pati, Ross Berbeco, and John Henry Lewis
    Annals of Applied Statistics (2014)
